message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with the problem of allocation, which is a central topic in game theory (cs.GT) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The concept of Pareto Efficiency is also relevant to optimization and decision making (cs.DS). The use of cardinal utility functions and the assumption of closed swaps suggest a mathematical and algorithmic approach, which is common in machine learning and optimization (cs.LG). Finally, the problem of fair allocation is also relevant to social choice theory (cs.SI).
